    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public abstract void apply(TargetParameter target,
                           java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Player>> previousTarget)
                    throws InvalidTargetException,
                           NoOwnerException
        this method apply the effect after checking the constraint
        Parameters:
        target - is a TargetParameter
        previousTarget - is the list of targets of the previous effects
        Throws:
        InvalidTargetException - when not all of the constraints return true
        NoOwnerException - when in target there isn't the owner or the owner position

      • constraintSquareGenerator

        protected abstract void constraintSquareGenerator(TargetParameter targetParameter)
                                           throws InvalidTargetException
        generate the constraintSquare for the constraints
        Parameters:
        targetParameter - is a target
        Throws:
        InvalidTargetException - when not all of the constraints return true

      • constraintsCheck

        public boolean constraintsCheck(TargetParameter target,
                                java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Player>> previousTarget)
                         throws NoOwnerException,
                                InvalidTargetException
        this method check if all of the constraint are verified
        Parameters:
        target - is a TargetParameter
        previousTarget - is the list of targets of the previous effects
        Returns:
        true if the effect can be applied
        Throws:
        NoOwnerException - when in target there isn't the owner or the owner position
        InvalidTargetException - when not all of the constraints return true

      • previousMan

        void previousMan(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Player>> previousTarget,
                 Player enemy,
                 boolean addToList,
                 boolean removeFromList)
        utility method for the usage of the previous targets list
        Parameters:
        previousTarget - is the list of targets of the previous effects
        enemy - is the player needed to add or remove from previos target list
        addToList - addToList true if the enemy is needed to be added to the previous target list at level 0
        removeFromList - true if the enemy is needed to be removed from the previous target list at level 0, and added at level 1

      • doRealDamage

        void doRealDamage(Player owner,
                  Player enemy,
                  int damage,
                  int mark,
                  java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Player>> previousTarget)
        utility method to apply the damages and marks on the targets
        Parameters:
        owner - owner of the weapon
        enemy - player who was shot
        damage - the amount of damage to apply
        mark - the amount of mark to apply
        previousTarget - is the list of targets of the previous effects
